meanings.def: used to show where somebody/something starts
examples: She began to walk away from him.
Has the train from Bristol arrived?

meanings.def: used to show what the origin of somebody/something is
examples: I'm from Italy.
documents from the sixteenth century
quotations from Shakespeare
heat from the sun

meanings.def: used to show who sent or gave something/somebody
examples: a letter from my brother
information from witnesses
the man from (= representing) the insurance company

meanings.def: used to show when something starts
examples: We're open from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. every day.
He was blind from birth.

meanings.def: used to show how far apart two places are
examples: 100 metres from the scene of the accident

meanings.def: used to show somebody’s position or point of view
examples: You can see the island from here.
From a financial point of view the project was a disaster.

meanings.def: used to show the range of something
examples: The temperature varies from 30 degrees to minus 20.
The store sells everything from shoelaces to computers.
Conditions vary from school to school.

meanings.def: used to show the state or form of something/somebody before a change
examples: Things have gone from bad to worse.
translating from English to Spanish
You need a break from routine.

meanings.def: used when making or recognizing a difference between two people or things
examples: Is Portuguese very different from Spanish?
I can't tell one twin from the other.

meanings.def: used to show the material that something is made of
examples: Steel is made from iron.

meanings.def: used to show that somebody/something is separated or removed
examples: The party was ousted from power after eighteen years.

meanings.def: used to show that something is prevented
examples: She saved him from drowning.

meanings.def: used to show the reason for something
examples: She felt sick from tiredness.

meanings.def: used to show the reason for making a judgement
examples: You can tell a lot about a person from their handwriting.
From what I heard the company's in deep trouble.

meanings.def: starting at the time mentioned and continuously after that
examples: From now on you can work on your own.
She never spoke to him again from that day on.

idioms.def: starting at the time mentioned and continuously after that
examples: From now on you can work on your own.
She never spoke to him again from that day on.
